# Documentation Templates

Templates for creating consistent project documentation.

## Available Templates

| Template | Use Case |
|----------|----------|
| [catalog-entry.md](catalog-entry.md) | Document a data table or dataset |
| [source-integration.md](source-integration.md) | Document a source system integration |
| [runbook.md](runbook.md) | Create operational runbooks |
| [adr.md](adr.md) | Record architectural decisions |

## Usage

1. Copy the template to your project's documentation folder
2. Fill in the placeholders (marked with `{placeholder}`)
3. Remove sections that don't apply
4. Update the Last Updated date

## Template Principles

- **Required fields** are marked - don't skip them
- **Optional sections** can be removed if not applicable
- **Consistency** - use the same format across all docs
- **Living documentation** - update when things change
